caller_intent: Victor Santiago needs assistance completing a Workers Comp policy audit for Travelers, which is currently non-compliant, and forgot to do it earlier.
resolution_steps: Agent confirms the audit is non-compliant and explains Victor needs to contact Travelers directly to open the audit.
Agent provides Travelers' registration portal (www.travelers.com/register/biz) to create an online account.
Agent directs Victor to the audit portal (www.travelers.com/audit) after account creation.
Agent offers to email Victor a letter with Travelers' contact details and audit instructions.
Agent reassures Victor he'll follow up via email with necessary information.
knowledge_required: Travelers Workers Comp policy audit process
Travelers online account registration and audit portals
Handling non-compliant audits for insurance policies
summary: Victor Santiago needed help completing a non-compliant Workers Comp audit for Travelers. The agent guided him to create an online account via Travelers' registration portal, directed him to the audit portal, and offered to email him a letter with Travelers' contact details and instructions. The agent emphasized contacting Travelers directly to resolve the non-compliance issue.
